title: Trying to set up my google account on Pixel 4
content: I am trying to set up google on pixel 4.  I come to a screen that says Add Phone?  The only option on that page is to tap Learn more. The only option on THAT page is close, which brings me back to the Add phone screen.  If I swipe up- -which seems to be the only thing I can do- -I lose everything and have to start over
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
